IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: K-12th GRADE PRIVATE CHRISTIAN SCHOOL. PROVIDES EDUCATION PROMOTING SCHOLASTIC EXCELLENCE, A CHRIST-CENTERED LIFESTYLE, PRINCIPLES IN THE WORD OF GOD, INSTRUCTION IN CHRISTIAN WORLDVIEW, AND PREPARES STUDENTS TO TAKE THEIR PLACES IN THE HOME, THE CHURCH, THEIR VOCATION AND THEIR COUNTRY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: BEREAN ACADEMY IS A K-12 PRIVATE CHRISTIAN SCHOOL WHICH SERVED 336 STUDENTS THROUGH THE 2022-23 SCHOOL YEAR. BEREAN PROVIDES EDUCATION WHICH PROMOTES A CHRIST-CENTERED LIFESTYLE, UPHOLDS A STANDARD OF SCHOLASTIC EXCELLENCE, PROMOTES THE PRINCIPLES ESTABLISHED IN THE WORD OF GOD, FURNISHES INSTRUCTION IN A CHRISTIAN WORLDVIEW, AND PREPARES STUDENTS TO TAKE THEIR PLACES IN THE HOME, THE CHURCH, THEIR VOCATION AND THEIR COUNTRY.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDED CHRISTIAN-BASED EDUCATION FOR 336 STUDENTS IN GRADES K-12. MOST REVENUE IS FROM TUITION PAID BY THE STUDENT'S FAMILIES. THE MAJORITY OF EXPENSES ARE FOR SALARIES OF EMPLOYEES, FOLLOWED BY STUDENT-ORIENTED EXPENSES AND EDUCATIONAL DEPARTMENT EXPENSES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: FOOD SERVICE: PROVIDED A DAILY HOT LUNCH PROGRAM FOR STUDENTS AND STAFF. REVENUE IS FROM MEALS PURCHASED BY STUDENTS AND STAFF. EXPENSES INCLUDE SALARIES, FOOD, AND SUPPLY COSTS, BUT DOES NOT INCLUDE OCCUPANCY COSTS WHICH ARE INCLUDED IN 4A ABOVE.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: TRANSPORTATION: PROVIDED (2) BUS ROUTES TO AND FROM SCHOOL DAILY, PLUS TRANSPORTATION TO AND FROM ACTIVITIES AS NEEDED. REVENUE IS FROM BUS FARES PURCHASED BY STUDENTS FOR DAILY BUS ROUTES. EXPENSES INCLUDE FUEL, INSURANCE, AND MAINTENANCE BUT NOT SALARIES WHICH ARE INCLUDED IN 4A ABOVE.

OtherAssetsOrgGrp.Desc: ASSETS LIMITED AS TO USE - ACQUISITION OF BUILDINGS AND EQUIPMENT
ASSETS LIMITED AS TO USE - AID PROGRAMS
ASSETS LIMITED AS TO USE - STUDENT ACTIVITIES

OtherLiabilitiesOrgGrp.Desc: HELD AS AGENT FOR ACTIVITY FUNDS

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ENDOWMENT EARNINGS AVAILABLE TO SUPPORT OPERATIONS OF THE ORGANIZATION. BOARD POLICY IS FOR DISTRIBUTION OF APPROXIMATELY 5% OF THE FUND'S BEGINNING BALANCE ANNUALLY UNLESS THE VALUE IS BELOW THE DONOR-RESTRICTED AMOUNT OR THE DISTRIBUTION WILL REDUCE THE BALANCE BELOW THAT AMOUNT. THE BOARD ELECTED TO FORGO ANY DISTRIBUTIONS IN THE LAST TWO YEARS.

The organization's policy is shown on the web site and in promotional advertisements, and is included in the student and staff handbooks and quarterly newsletters. The organization's policy is shown on the web site and in promotional advertisements, and is included in the student and staff handbooks and quarterly newsletters.
FAMILY RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN SEVERAL BOARD MEMBERS AND STAFF, SEE SCHEDULE L
MEMBERSHIP CONSISTS OF PARENTS, STAFF AND SIGNIFICANT DONORS FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
MEMBERS APPROVE SIGNIFICANT DECISIONS OF THE GOVERNING BODY.
THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY AT LEAST ONE OFFICER BEFORE IT IS FILED.
AN ANNUAL EVALUATION IS DONE BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS BASED ON JOB DESCRIPTION.
FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE AND PRESENTED AT THE ORGANIZATION'S ANNUAL MEETING. GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE IN THE ORGANIZATION'S OFFICE UPON REQUEST.
